EmailTemplate.subject: Get on the Waitlist for Contactless Dine-In with Aloha
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Offer contactless dine-in with Aloha. No cards. No pens. No physical menus. ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> You’re trying to make up lost revenue and get new guests in the door.
They’re feeling cagey about touching surfaces and interacting with people.
Now you can make {{company.Company Name:default=your restaurant}}’s in-house dining experience safer, and give your guests the confidence to return, with Aloha’s new contactless order and pay features for dine-in.
Your guests simply use their mobile phone to scan a QR code and:
1. See your digital menu 2. Order what they want 3. Pay for their orderYou’ll be able to add this soon as a new feature of Aloha’s online ordering capabilities. And be one of the first restaurants to bring touchless to your tables. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
